TopicTitle: Mod giving newly recruited Kerbals 5 stars in career

Articles.Content:
Hello,

since I see no reason why a Kerbal should be any better for repairing tires after going to Duna/Minmus,

I m interested in a mod/.dll which starts kerbals with 5 stars in career mode.

Or the place where I can change that in the configs myself.

Or how to change the XP rewards for eg Kerbin.

Thank you very much!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-11T17:08:28Z" title="06/11/2015 05:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 11, 2015</time> by Yemo**
I think I would just like to be able to higher better trained kerbals. I've only ever see 1 star kerbals available for hire.

**Is anyone willing to make such a .dll which sets the kerbal experience to 5 stars in career mode?**

With 1.0.x it also influences the science lab, which is impossible to rebalance to more realistic terms given the current cfg moddability.

Ah here! 

\*sniping sounds\*

[https://github.com/OakTree42/KSI-Hiring](https://github.com/OakTree42/KSI-Hiring)

This mod rebalances the hiring thing. Max it can go is level 2. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) but it is closer. Is it acceptable?
